text: vahee hai jisane kitaabavaalon mein se un logon ko jinhonne inakaar kiya, unake gharon se pahale hee jamaavade mein nikal baahar kiya. tumhen gumaan na tha ki unakee gadhiyaan allaah se unhen bacha lengee. kintu allaah unapar vahaan se aaya jisaka unhen gumaan bhee na tha. aur usane unake dilon mein rob daal diya ki ve apane gharon ko svayan apane haathon aur eemaanavaalon ke haathon bhee ujaadane lage. atah shiksha grahan karo, ai drshti rakhanevaalo
